definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Klein or Kline (name)/Felix Klein (1849-1925), German mathematician
Berkeley (name)/George Berkeley (1685-1753), Bishop of Cloyne, famous British philosopher/Berkeley, university city in the San Francisco bay area, California

pinyin: Ke4 lai2 si1 le4 Qi4 che1 Gong1 si1
Ka3 er3 wen2 Ke4 lai2 yin1

definition: Michael Crichton (1942-), US techno-thriller writer, author of Jurassic Park
pinyin: Mai4 ke4 er3 · Ke4 lai2 dun4

sentences.english: Gillett and Hicks hired Barclays Capital to put out feelers internationally to find a buyer.
sentences.chinese: 吉列特和希克斯委托巴克莱帮助他们全球寻找买主。

sentences.english: He also became embroiled in controversy surrounding the government bail-out of Chrysler.
sentences.chinese: 同时他也因政府保释克莱斯勒而被卷入巨大争议。

sentences.english: Barclaycard's Northampton office is the first to receive a CoLab space.
sentences.chinese: 巴克莱的北安办事处第一个接受了CoLab空间。

sentences.english: The Mon Calamari are said to be the soul of the Rebel Alliance.
sentences.chinese: 蒙克莱梅利人常被称为是反抗军联盟的灵魂人物。

sentences.english: A city of southwest Scotland on the Clyde River.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰西南部克莱德河上的一个城市。

sentences.english: Berkeley took a leaf out of Newton's book by going instrumentalist.
sentences.chinese: 柏克莱借鉴了牛顿的工具主义。

sentences.english: When plans for that marriage collapsed, he turned to Barclays.
sentences.chinese: 当这个联姻计划失败时，他转向巴克莱银行。

sentences.english: The dinner took place at the Hotel Majestic, 19 Avenue Kléber, in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 晚宴在巴黎克莱贝尔大道19号的宏伟酒店内举行。

sentences.english: Its assets were later bought up by Barclays.
sentences.chinese: 它的资产随后被巴克莱如数购进。

sentences.english: The old woman, hearing Clemencia's voice, went back to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 老妇人，听克莱门的声音，回去睡觉。

sentences.english: That was until Sinclair cracked it home with a fantastic diagonal shot.
sentences.chinese: 直到辛克莱禁区斜角的梦幻施射才破门。

sentences.english: We Canadians are close neighbors. Give me that Chrysler at half price"?
sentences.chinese: 我们是你们的邻居，那辆克莱斯勒半价给我好吗？

sentences.english: Sylar is hurt. Did Claire do it?
sentences.chinese: 塞拉受伤。是克莱尔干的？

sentences.english: Until he does, I've got Clemenza and Tessio looking for him.
sentences.chinese: 我已经让克莱门扎和忒希奥两人负责找他。

sentences.english: Austerity was a new idea at Chrysler.
sentences.chinese: 厉行节约在克莱斯勒公司是一件新鲜事。

definition: Kohl (name)/Helmut Kohl (1930-2017), German CDU politician, Chancellor 1982-1998
Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
